content:
Deleting this provider will revoke access for all users, and its settings will be permanently erased.
 To use the provider again, you will need to set it up from scratch.

comment.text: This text provides a warning message within a confirmation dialog. It explains the consequences of deleting an AI provider, including loss of access and settings, and the need to reconfigure it. This description helps users understand the impact before confirming the deletion.

usage.context:
return (
 <ModalDialog visible displayType={ModalDialogType.modal} onClose={onClose}>
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("AISettings:DeleteProvider")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <Text>{t("AISettings:DeleteProviderDescription")}</Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 primary
 size={ButtonSize.normal}
